ygData.subject: Re: Alliance
ygData.msgSnippet: As Blacknightmare stepped onto the right oath the orb began to glow a bit. Ball: Is greed your choice? ... that ... Blacknightmare ... hate, ... fear. ...

As Blacknightmare stepped onto the right oath the orb began to glow a 
bit.

Ball: "Is greed your choice?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Blacknightmare::
> 
> Blacknightmare was thinking the right answer and she started to 
> walk... towards the right.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > As Darkfate enetered the room he was greeted by the same room 
that 
> > Blackknightmare was in, however from an aerial move. 
Blacknightmare 
> > could not here Darkfate, see him, or sense him. Back inside the 
> room 
> > the ball spins around and begins to glow yellow.
> > 
> > Ball: "This first test is a question. Each of the three paths 
> before 
> > you represent a cause for war. The path to the left signifies 
hate, 
> > the path to the right, greed, the one in the center signifies 
fear. 
> > Which Blacknightmare of these three causes is the true cause of 
> war? 
> > When you have selected your answer step onto its path."
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > Darkfate/Blacknightmare:
> > > 
> > > Darkfate followed Blight. Blacknightmare was calmed down and 
> > > answered "What are test's rules? What have I to do?"
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > > > Blight: "Only one may take the test. It is not a written one. 
> Now 
> > > > then come with me and we shall begin."
> > > > 
> > > > Blight smirked as he walked through one of the walls which 
> > > afterwards 
> > > > opened for Darkfate to enter. Elsewhere, a crane slowly 
> deposited 
> > > > Blacknightmare in a room with no light or any fixtures of any 
> > kind. 
> > > > However a moment later a blue orb flew up to him and three 
> paths 
> > > were 
> > > > lit up on the floor.
> > > > 
> > > > Ball: "Hello, we are now here for you to take a test. Pass 
and 
> > the 
> > > > reward will be great, fail and you and Darkfate die."
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > > > Darkfate:::
> > > > > 
> > > > > "I should take the test too"Replied Darkfate "it's a big 
> risk, 
> > > but 
> > > > > rewards is worthy... What do you said?"
